Interface MaterialService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MaterialServiceImpl
public interface MaterialService
Service Interface for Study Material Management. Defines business logic for uploading and retrieving materials.

    Handles the complete process of uploading a study material.

  • Method Details

    • uploadMaterial

      MaterialResponseDto uploadMaterial(MaterialDto materialDto)
      Handles the complete process of uploading a study material. 1. Uploads file to Cloudinary. 2. Sets status based on User Role (Admin -> Approved, Student -> Pending). 3. Saves metadata to Database.
      Parameters:
      materialDto - The data and file from the frontend.
      Returns:
      The saved Material entity.

    • getAllApprovedMaterials

      List<MaterialResponseDto> getAllApprovedMaterials()
      Retrieves a list of materials for students. Only returns materials with "APPROVED" status.
      Returns:
      List of approved materials.

      List<MaterialResponseDto> getPendingMaterials()
